name: relay-monorepo
description: Relay API - Microservices monorepo with API Gateway, Auth, Post, and Notification services

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n "DOCKER,GATEWAY,AUTH,POST,NOTIFY,CLIENT" -c "auto" "docker compose up" "pnpm dev:gateway" "pnpm dev:auth" "pnpm dev:post" "pnpm dev:notification" "pnpm dev:client"
